item.description:
Dr. Brian Clement - Healing Through Diet
at Raw Vegan Potluck Dinner

Dr. Clement is an acclaimed author, international lecturer, and the director of the renowned Hippocrates Health Institute, which has been helping people to heal themselves for more than 50 years. He will explain quantum health and how individual choices have global impacts. An extensive question and answer period will be offered so that participants will leave with viable, personal roadmaps back to completely healthy lives.

5:30 - 6:00 PM DVD Heartbeat of America
6:00 - 7:00 PM Dinner
7:00 - 8:30 PM LIFEFORCE: Superior Health & Spiritual Longevity & Book Signing

WRNC Members $5
Non-Members $10
Admission fee without bringing food $20
Children under 18 FREE but must bring another dish.

If you bring organic, unprocessed , raw/vegan/ non-animal based/ living plant-based food ready to serve dish to feed 6-8 people; include recipe and serving implements (labeled with your name).

For directions: call (781) 891-0650 x 56
Questions: call Betsy Bragg at 781-899-6664 or cell 617-835-2913
See Calendar of Events on www. rawnewenglandcommunity.com for Dr.Brian Clementâ€™s Sept 20 -24 MA speaking engagements.

Need a ride: call Joe Gerber 781-444-8461.

###
